41.eng-name: The Book of al-Fara' and al-'Atirah

hadiths.text: Ibn'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah saw a dead sheep that belonged to the freed slave woman of Maimunah, and had come from the Sadaqah." He said: "Why don't you take off its hide and make use of it?" They said: "It is dead meat." He said: "It is only unlawful to eat it

chapter.eng-name: The Skin Of Dead Animals (Those Not Slaughtered Or Killed Properly)
